CustomField.description: Slope: Please indicate if roof is low slope or steep slope. (Low slope=less than or equal to 2:12,, Steep slope=a slope of more than 2:12)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Slope: Please indicate if roof is low slope or steep slope (Low slope = less than or equal to 2:12, Steep slope = a slope of more than 2:12).
CustomField.label: Slope
